name: florianbelhomme/foundation-bundle
description: Integrates Foundation, by Zurb, into Symfony2 by providing templates, Twig extensions, services and commands.

suggest.knplabs/knp-paginator-bundle: FoundationBundle styles the pagination provided by KnpPaginatorBundle.
suggest.knplabs/knp-menu-bundle: FoundationBundle styles the menus provided by KnpMenuBundle.
